Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy takes over as the new captain of the Welsh national team.
Aaron Ramsey remains as captain for Wales.
Chris Mepham is an injury concern for Wales.
Merih Demiral is suspended for Turkey, while Hakan Calhanoglu and Semih Kilicsoy are injury concerns.
Vincenzo Montella has an exciting and young group of Turkish talent at his disposal.
